page.title: 16Kirtlington Clubs/Societies
page.content: There are many clubs and societies in Kirtlington. Most of them are listed below: Allotment Society 45 members Bell-ringing 6 members Brownies 15 members Cricket Club 50 members Cubs 17 members Football Club 69 members Garden Club 40 members Morris Men 18 members Mothers' Union 30 members Polo Club 40 members Royal British Legion 33 members Scouts 18 members Welcome Club 80 members Women's Institute 30 members Youth Club 25 members For further details of any of these clubs please contact the Rector at Kirtlington Vicarage, who has a list of club secretaries.
